recipesJson.name: Mangoloupe
recipesJson.author: ENYAWREKLAW
recipesJson.description: A very simple, very fun and delicious Mango Cantaloupe mix. Feel free to tweak Cantaloupe to fit your desired mango output.

reviews.text: This is a nice little pairing. I've been enjoying this mix quite a bit. Thanks again Wayne..

I find this mix to be slightly odd, and I find myself to be falling oddly in love with it. I would give this one 6 if I could. To be so simple, cheap, easy on the coils and full of flavor, this just had to move to the forefront of my ADV rotation.
This is the best 2 flavour (+Super Sweet) recipe of the year imo. I simply love it. Many thx Wayne.
